wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: sitelen ni la lawa "[[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [[creativecommons:by-sa/3.0/deed.en|Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported]]" li lawa e kepeken.
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: sina ken sama e lipu, li ken pana e ona
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: o toki e nimi pi jan pali. o linja tawa lawa kepeken. sina ante e lipu la, o toki e ni. ni la sina ken kepeken nasin toki pona ale. taso sina ken ala toki e ni: "jan pali li toki pona lon kepeken mi."
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: sina ante e lipu la, sina o pana e pali sin kepeken [[ccorg:share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses|lawa sama]].
